snippet: Prosecutors have charged three people with stealing $2,000 in cash from a real estate worker, and one of them with second-degree murder.
abstract: Robert Reichl, lured to roof of a Brooklyn apartment building and robbed, falls to his death; investigators believe that Reichl was sprayed with unknown substance that may have impaired his vision before falling off the roof; police have arrested three suspects.

byline.original: By WINNIE HU and E. C. GOGOLAK

lead_paragraph: Prosecutors have charged three people with stealing $2,000 in cash from a real estate worker, and one of them with second-degree murder.

headline.main: Lured to Roof and Robbed, Man Falls to His Death
headline.print_headline: Lured to Roof And Robbed, Man Falls To His Death
